Text:
14. Dalit. Girl. Missing since 4 PM. 
 Kerosene doused. Ablaze.  
 Bright student. Fading star. 
 Receding from public memory. 
 Dead!

Devika your TV set could not be repaired 
 Your father lost his job as an agricultural hand 
 They didn’t own a mobile or table

“Do-gooders please donate funds, old phones, and computers 
 321 million students must attend class
The girl's family has asked for donations to help find her, saying she was a bright student with the same dream as her parents
‧Her family has not confirmed that she's alive. But, they have released pictures of the missing girl, saying she appears to be in good health and has a bright future.
The family is urging the public for help to find the missing girl, who went missing from her home in the village of Bhatkal, Jharkhand on
THINK: There are billions still who’ve never made a phone call.
